column5: Well I dont know where to begin... I been going out ice fishing for atleast 7times or more.. but always unlucky, at the end of the day.. big "O" So suddenly I asked for help, things that I need to know, what to used.. how to search.. I pm MR TERRY and he is able to share stuff that I need to know.. I follow the steps and I was amazed in the result.. thnx Terry.   here is the pic from sat      and my sunday    bfisher
Nice catch !!! Lots of experience here to draw from
